name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
schedule:

1　　Introduction
2     　　Interpretation as a Profession
3     　　Public speaking I/ Paraphrasing
4     　　Paraphrasing/Sight translation I

9    　　Mid-term

11    　　Memory retention/Recall exercises II: Short CI on general topics

13   　　Note-taking for CI II: Skills and strategies 
14   　　Note-taking for CI III: Long CI on general topics
15   　　Note-taking for CI V: Long CI on general topics *
16   　　Break

scorePolicy:
Assessment
30% on mid-term examination
30% on final examination
40% on continual assessments: attendance to lectures; in-class performance; homework
